original_query: SELECT MIN(c.Id) FROM comments as c, posts as p, postHistory as ph, badges as b, users as u WHERE u.Id = ph.UserId AND u.Id = b.UserId AND u.Id = p.OwnerUserId AND u.Id = c.UserId AND c.Score=0 AND p.PostTypeId=1 AND p.ViewCount>=0 AND p.ViewCount<=4157 AND p.FavoriteCount=0 AND p.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-09-08 09:58:16' AS TIMESTAMP)
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM comments AS comments WHERE comments.Score = 0

CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM posts AS posts WHERE posts.PostTypeId = 1 AND (CAST(posts.ViewCount AS INTEGER) >= 0 AND CAST(posts.ViewCount AS INTEGER) <= 4157) AND posts.FavoriteCount = 0 AND posts.CreationDate <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-08 09:58:16'
CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM badges AS badges
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E4 AS SELECT * FROM E2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4 WHERE E2.OwnerUserId=E4.UserId)
CREATE VIEW E5 AS SELECT * FROM users AS users
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E4E5 AS SELECT * FROM E2E4 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E5 WHERE E2E4.OwnerUserId=E5.Id)
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM postHistory AS postHistory
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E4E5E3 AS SELECT * FROM E2E4E5 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E2E4E5.OwnerUserId=E3.UserId)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2E4E5E3 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2E4E5E3 WHERE E1.UserId=E2E4E5E3.OwnerUserId)
